backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing quiz section removal and layout updates with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files including sections, layout, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styling resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing navigation, hero, quiz, and closing sections.
frontend/src/components/DedicationLayout: Reusable layout wrapper enforcing consistent container width and padding.
frontend/src/components/quiz/Celebration: Full-screen confetti, burst, and sparkle animation rendered when triggered.
frontend/src/components/sections/Closing: Displays closing dedication message, ornament, footer, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, title, subtitle, hands illustration, and large photo with fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/LetterS: Renders dedication letter heading and paragraphs in a centered layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Moments: Grid of memory cards with titles, dates, and descriptions styled with sparkle icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSec: Renders an interactive quiz with stateful navigation, scoring, celebrations, and a results screen. Manages question flow, correct-answer animations, and quiz reset.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll detection and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/content/dedicationContent.t: Provides all static site content including hero text, quiz questions and results, letter paragraphs, and moments entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client setup, login state, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark color variables, applying global typography and layout settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, applying global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
